name: Completely Random
description:
The title “Completely Random” certainly fits as the game ended up being a hodge-podge of things. You control a character that shoots ducks in order to kill ghosts which in turn unlocks some boxes that contain items for you to collect and bring color back into the game world.

Instructions: 

For best results play in landscape

Kill 5 of any of the ghosts to unlock the blue square (enter from the left size)

Kill 10 of any of the ghosts to unlock the green square (enter from the bottom)

Kill 15 of any of the ghosts to unlock the red square (enter from the right size)

Controls:

Tap/hold either side of the screen near the edges to move left or right

Swipe up to jump

Swipe down to shoot
